description: Declaration of VAT (IVA) for quarterly submission

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(si.grand_total) AS total_sales_amount_subject_to_vat
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` AS si
INNER JOIN 
    `tabSales Taxes and Charges` AS stc
    ON si.name = stc.parent
WHERE 
    LOWER(stc.description) LIKE '%vat%'
model_values.value_description: Total Sales Amount Subject to VAT

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(stc.tax_amount) AS total_vat_collected_on_sales
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` AS si
INNER JOIN 
    `tabSales Taxes and Charges` AS stc
    ON si.name = stc.parent
WHERE 
    LOWER(stc.description) LIKE '%vat%'

SELECT 
    SUM(ptc.tax_amount) AS total_vat_paid_on_purchases
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` AS pi
INNER JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` AS ptc
    ON pi.name = ptc.parent
WHERE
    LOWER(ptc.description) LIKE '%vat%'

SELECT
    (
        (SELECT 
            COALESCE(SUM(stc.tax_amount), 0)
         FROM
            `tabSales Invoice` AS si
         INNER JOIN 
            `tabSales Taxes and Charges` AS stc
            ON si.name = stc.parent
         WHERE
            LOWER(stc.description) LIKE '%vat%'
        )
        -
        (SELECT 
            COALESCE(SUM(ptc.tax_amount), 0)
         FROM 
            `tabPurchase Invoice` AS pi
         INNER JOIN 
            `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` AS ptc
            ON pi.name = ptc.parent
         WHERE 
            LOWER(ptc.description) LIKE '%vat%'
        )
    ) AS net_vat_applied;
model_values.value_description: Net VAT Payable (VAT Collected - VAT Paid)

name: Modelo 303

description: Quarterly declaration of IRPF (income tax) withholdings on payments.

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT a.name AS account
FROM tabAccount AS a
JOIN tabAccount AS p ON a.parent_account = p.name
WHERE p.account_number = 4751  
AND a.custom_es_cuenta_de_empleado = 0;
model_values.value_description: Total number of suppliers with IRPF withholding

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT a.name AS account
FROM tabAccount AS a
JOIN tabAccount AS p ON a.parent_account = p.name
WHERE p.account_number = 4751  
AND a.custom_es_cuenta_de_empleado = 1;
model_values.value_description: Total number of employees with IRPF withholding

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT a.name AS account
FROM tabAccount AS a
JOIN tabAccount AS p ON a.parent_account = p.name
WHERE p.account_number = 4751  
AND a.custom_es_cuenta_de_empleado = 0;
model_values.value_description: Total IRPF amount withheld from suppliers

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT a.name AS account
FROM tabAccount AS a
JOIN tabAccount AS p ON a.parent_account = p.name
WHERE p.account_number = 4751  
AND a.custom_es_cuenta_de_empleado = 1;
model_values.value_description: Total IRPF amount withheld from employees

name: Modelo 111
